title: AD Tristana Buffed or Nerfed?
body:
I feel she is now more OP but my friend says that doesn't make any sense because her attack speed and range was nerfed. But me being a Tristana main to me she feels more OP than she use to be.  sure AP was nerfed but her AD feels OP now before.


It doesn't help that her E now eats towers quicker than before and it also tears enemy champions a new one as well.
